snippet: The rookie Chase Elliott, 20, kept the No. 24 Chevrolet on the pole for a second straight Daytona 500, becoming the youngest driver to land the lead spot in the race.
abstract: Rookie driver Chase Elliott takes pole at Daytona 500; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: The rookie Chase Elliott, 20, kept the No. 24 Chevrolet on the pole for a second straight Daytona 500, becoming the youngest driver to land the lead spot in the race.
